Title: The evil system of colonialism and imperialism arose and throve with the enslavement of n*****s ...
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Note the burning US Capitol, below left.The fulll quotation:The evil system of colonialism and imperialism arose and throve with the enslavement of negroes and the trade in negroes, and it will surely come to its end with the complete emancipation of the black people. Mao Tse-Tung.The French version is here.
Theme: Foreign imperialistsForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
